sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of consumer behavior occurring in a market
message_1: In a particular market, it is known from past data that 70% of customers always purchase product A and 30% always purchase product B. If a new customer walks into the market, what is the probability that they will purchase product A?
message_2: Since we know from past data that 70% of customers always purchase product A, the probability that a new customer will purchase product A is 70% or 0.7.
